greeting: Sup, welcome to Burger King! What can I grill for you?

menu_items.name: Bacon King Meal
menu_items.description: Our BACON KINGâ„¢ Sandwich features two 1/4 lb* savory flame-grilled beef patties topped with a generous portion of thick-cut smoked bacon, melted American cheese, ketchup, and creamy mayonnaise on a soft sesame seed bun.
